name: iron-iot-common
description: download and run build:  `rm -rf build.sh && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ironman9967/iron-iot-common/master/scripts/build.sh && chmod +x build.sh && ./build.sh [cloud or hub]`

scripts.release: chmod +x ./scripts/release.sh && ./scripts/release.sh v$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
scripts.release-patch: npm run bump -- patch && npm run release
scripts.release-minor: npm run bump -- minor && npm run release
